description.fa: دکتر آمنه سلیمانی به دلیل کمک و درمان معترضین دستگیر شده و معلوم نیست کجاست.
description.en: Dr. Ameneh Soleimani was brutally arrested in Ardabil by Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) Intelligence agents for providing medical assistance to people injured during the protests.
